languages.text: {n}Проктор свирепо выдыхает.{/n} "Нет, я не сорвусь опять. Не из-за тебя, ублюдок. Я приговорю тебя, не теряя лица, как и положено арбитру".
{n}The Proctor exhales fiercely.{/n} "No, I won't lose my grip again. Not over scum like you. I will sentence you with dignity, as befits an Arbitrator."
languages.original_text: {n}Проктор свирепо выдыхает.{/n} "Нет, я не сорвусь опять. Не из-за тебя, ублюдок. Я приговорю тебя, не теряя лица, как и положено арбитру".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Proctor exhales fiercely.{/n} "No, I won't lose my grip again. Not because of scum like you. I will sentence you with dignity as befits an Arbitrator."
{n}The Proctor exhales fiercely.{/n} "No, I won't lose my grip again. Not because of scum like you. I will sentence you with dignity as befits an Arbitrator."
{n}The Proctor exhales fiercely.{/n} "No, I won't lose my grip again. Not over scum like you. I will sentence you with dignity, as befits an Arbitrator."

{n}The Proctor exhales fiercely.{/n} "No, I won't lose my grip again. Not over scum like you. I will sentence you with dignity, as befits an Arbitrator."
{n}The Proctor exhales fiercely.{/n} "No, I won't lose my grip again. Not over scum like you. I will sentence you with dignity, as befits an Arbitrator."

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙猛地呼了一大口气。{/n}“不，我不会再次失控了，为你这样的渣滓不值得。我会带着法务官应有的尊严，正式宣读你的罪状。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Proctor exhales fiercely.{/n} "No, I won't lose my grip again. Not over scum like you. I will sentence you with dignity, as befits an Arbitrator."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙猛地呼了一大口气。{/n}“不，我不会再次失控了，为你这样的渣滓不值得。我会带着法务官应有的尊严，正式宣读你的罪状。”

languages.text: {n}El Procurador exhala con fiereza.{/n} «No, no volveré a perder la compostura. No por escoria como tú. Te daré una sentencia con dignidad, como corresponde a un Arbitrator».
languages.original_text: {n}The Proctor exhales fiercely.{/n} "No, I won't lose my grip again. Not over scum like you. I will sentence you with dignity, as befits an Arbitrator."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Procurador exhala con fiereza.{/n} «No, no volveré a perder la compostura. No por escoria como tú. Te daré una sentencia con dignidad, como corresponde a un Arbitrator».

languages.text: {n}Le proctor expire un grand coup.{/n} « Non, je ne perdrai pas pied de nouveau. Pas pour une ordure comme vous. Je vais faire appliquer votre sentence avec dignité, comme l'exige mon titre d'arbitrator. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Proctor exhales fiercely.{/n} "No, I won't lose my grip again. Not over scum like you. I will sentence you with dignity, as befits an Arbitrator."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le proctor expire un grand coup.{/n} « Non, je ne perdrai pas pied de nouveau. Pas pour une ordure comme vous. Je vais faire appliquer votre sentence avec dignité, comme l'exige mon titre d'arbitrator. »

languages.text: {n}代理人は荒々しく息を吐いた。{/n}「いいや、もう二度と自分を見失ったりはしない。お前のようなクズに対してもだ。俺はアービトレイターにふさわしく、威厳をもってお前に判決を下す」
languages.original_text: {n}The Proctor exhales fiercely.{/n} "No, I won't lose my grip again. Not over scum like you. I will sentence you with dignity, as befits an Arbitrator."

traits.locale_text: {n}代理人は荒々しく息を吐いた。{/n}「いいや、もう二度と自分を見失ったりはしない。お前のようなクズに対してもだ。俺はアービトレイターにふさわしく、威厳をもってお前に判決を下す」

languages.text: {n}Üsteğmen öfkeyle nefes veriyor.{/n} "Hayır, yine kontrolü kaybetmeyeceğim. Hele senin gibi bir pislik için asla. Seni bir Yargıcı'ya yaraşır şekilde onurunla cezalandıracağım."
languages.original_text: {n}The Proctor exhales fiercely.{/n} "No, I won't lose my grip again. Not over scum like you. I will sentence you with dignity, as befits an Arbitrator."

traits.locale_text: {n}Üsteğmen öfkeyle nefes veriyor.{/n} "Hayır, yeniden kontrolü kaybetmeyeceğim. Hele senin gibi bir pislik için asla. Seni bir Yargıcı'ya yaraşır şekilde onurunla cezalandıracağım."

languages.text: {n}Der Proktor atmet wild aus.{/n} "Nein, ich werde meine Beherrschung nicht erneut verlieren. Nicht wegen solchem Abschaum. Ich werde Euch mit Würde verurteilen, wie es einem Arbitrator geziemt."
languages.original_text: {n}The Proctor exhales fiercely.{/n} "No, I won't lose my grip again. Not over scum like you. I will sentence you with dignity, as befits an Arbitrator."
